title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 374.0 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 374.0 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part sets forth procedures for providing persons
with notice that their tax overpayments are being credited to obligations to
repay overpayments of public assistance and procedures for persons to contest
determinations of the department to make such credits of their tax
overpayments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
374.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
